conclusion: Analyze the graph of the object's acceleration with respect to displacement.
The graph shows a linear increase in acceleration up to x1.
After x1, the acceleration decreases linearly.
The acceleration is zero at x2.
The acceleration is negative after x2.
The acceleration is zero at x2, indicating that the object is momentarily stationary at this point.
Since the acceleration is zero at x1, the velocity is also zero at this point.
